title: Astragaloside IV Alleviates the Myocardial Damage Induced by Lipopolysaccharide via the Toll-Like Receptor 4 (TLR4)/Nuclear Factor kappa B (NF-kappa B)/Proliferator-Activated Receptor alpha (PPAR alpha) Signaling Pathway
